unpublishedAction.name: trip
jsonPathKeys:
{
  "in_word_text": InWordsFinal.text,
  "website": "https://apitemplate.io",
  "document_id": "889856789012",
  "invoice_number": invoiceNumberFinal.text,
  "issue_date_time": issueDateFinal.text,
  "due_date":dueDateFinal.text,
  "invoice_period":invoicePeriodFinal.text,
  "shop_id":shopIdFinal.text,
  "shop_name":Text2Copy.text,
  "pickup_point":Text2.text, 
	"redx_logo":"https://redx.com.bd/images/new-redx-logo.svg", 
  "Description": Table3.tableData[0].load_point ,
	"Unite_of_Supply": Table3.tableData[0].unload_point,
  "Qty":Table3.tableData[0].fleet_requested_at,
  "Unit_Value":Table3.tableData[0].vehicle_number,
  "VAT": get_invoice.data[0].vat_rate,
  "VAT_Amnt":get_invoice.data[0].vat,
  "Total_Value":Table3.tableData[0].challan_number,
  "Total_Amount":
(function() {	
const price = parseFloat(get_invoice.data[0].total_price_after_vat_ait).toFixed(2);

let dollarUSLocale = Intl.NumberFormat(undefined, {
	style: 'currency',
	currency: 'BDT'
});
	return dollarUSLocale.format(price).replace('BDT','').trim() 
})(), 
	"items":get_topsheet_data_v2.data.map(a=>{
		return {
			"Fleet Requested At": a.fleet_requested_at,
			"Id": a.id,
			"Fleet Tracking Id":a.fleet_tracking_id,
			"Payment Method":a.payment_method,
			"Shop Id":a.shop_id,
			"Shop Name":a.shop_name,
			"Vehicle Number":a.vehicle_number,
			"Challan Number":a.challan_number,
			"LC Number":a.lc_number,
			"Load Point":a.load_point,
			"Unload Point":a.unload_point,
			"Base Fare":a.base_fare,
			"Total Additional Fee":a.total_additional_fee,
			"Total Amount [Incl.SD & VAT] (BDT)": a.total_amount_incl_sd_vat,
			"Remarks":a.remarks.trim() 
		}
	})
}
